languages.text: {n}Вы готовы поклясться, что рядом обычно размещен пост стражи... но сейчас их место пустует. Куда делись блюстители — отличный вопрос для губернатора Драйвстема.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Кажется, стража покинула свой пост — поблизости нет никого, кто мог бы рассказать о мертвеце или том, кто был с ним перед смертью".

languages.text: {n}You are almost certain that wardens are usually stationed nearby... but their post is empty. Where have they gone? This would be an excellent question to put to Governor Drivestem.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы готовы поклясться, что рядом обычно размещен пост стражи... но сейчас их место пустует. Куда делись блюстители — отличный вопрос для губернатора Драйвстема.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You swear that there are usually guards posted nearby... but there are none an the moment. Where did the guards go — an excellent question for Governor Drivestem.{/n}
{n}You swear that there are usually guards posted nearby... but there are none an the moment. Where did the guards go — an excellent question for Governor Drivestem.{/n}
{n}You swear that there are typically guards posted nearby... but there are none at the moment. Where the guards have gone would be an excellent question posed to Governor Drivestem.{/n}
{n}You swear that there are typically guards posted nearby... but there are none at the moment. Where the guards have gone would be an excellent question posed to Governor Drivestem.{/n}
{n}You are almost certain that wardens are usually stationed nearby... but their post is empty. Where have they gone? This would be an excellent question to put to Governor Drivestem.{/n}
{n}You are almost certain that wardens are usually stationed nearby... but their post is empty. Where have they gone? This would be an excellent question to put to Governor Drivestem.{/n}

languages.text: {n}いつもは監視員が近くに駐在しているはずだ。だが…彼らの持ち場には誰もいない。どこへ行ったのだろう？これはドライブステム総督に投げかけるには絶好の問いだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are almost certain that wardens are usually stationed nearby... but their post is empty. Where have they gone? This would be an excellent question to put to Governor Drivestem.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}いつもは監視員が近くに駐在しているはずだ。だが…彼らの持ち場には誰もいない。どこへ行ったのだろう？これはドライブステム総督に投げかけるには絶好の問いだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你几乎可以肯定，这里通常都会有卫兵驻守……可现在却连一个人影也没有。卫兵都到哪里去了？一会可得好好问问德莱夫斯塔总督。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are almost certain that wardens are usually stationed nearby... but their post is empty. Where have they gone? This would be an excellent question to put to Governor Drivestem.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你几乎可以肯定，这里通常都会有卫兵驻守……可现在却连一个人影也没有。卫兵都到哪里去了？一会可得好好问问德莱夫斯塔总督。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous jureriez qu'il y a généralement des gardes en faction dans les environs... mais ils ont visiblement abandonné leur poste. Où ont-ils bien pu passer ? Vous devriez sans doute poser la question au gouverneur Drivestem.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are almost certain that wardens are usually stationed nearby... but their post is empty. Where have they gone? This would be an excellent question to put to Governor Drivestem.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous jureriez qu'il y a généralement des gardes en faction dans les environs... mais ils ont visiblement abandonné leur poste. Où ont-ils bien pu passer ? Vous devriez sans doute poser la question au gouverneur Drivestem.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Estás bastante segur{mf|o|a} de que aquí suelen estar apostados los guardias... pero su puesto está vacío. ¿Dónde habrán ido? Es una pregunta que el gobernador Drivestem debería poder contestar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are almost certain that wardens are usually stationed nearby... but their post is empty. Where have they gone? This would be an excellent question to put to Governor Drivestem.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Estás bastante segur{mf|o|a} de que aquí suelen estar apostados los guardias... pero su puesto está vacío. ¿Dónde habrán ido? Es una pregunta que el gobernador Drivestem debería poder contestar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bist dir fast sicher, dass in der Nähe für gewöhnlich Wächter stationiert sind ... aber ihr Posten ist verlassen. Wo sind sie? Das wäre eine ausgezeichnete Frage für Gouverneur Drivestem.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are almost certain that wardens are usually stationed nearby... but their post is empty. Where have they gone? This would be an excellent question to put to Governor Drivestem.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du könntest schwören, dass hier in der Nähe üblicherweise Wachen postiert sind ... im Moment sind aber keine zu sehen. Wo die Wachen abgeblieben sind, das wäre eine hervorragende Frage an Gouverneur Drivestem.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Burada dizdar garnizonu olduğundan neredeyse eminsin fakat nöbette kimse yok. Nereye gitmiş olabilirler? Vali Drivestem'e sorulabilecek harika bir soru.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are almost certain that wardens are usually stationed nearby... but their post is empty. Where have they gone? This would be an excellent question to put to Governor Drivestem.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Burada muhafız garnizonu olduğundan neredeyse eminsin.. ama nöbette kimse yok. Nereye gitmiş olabilirler? Vali Drivestem'e sormak için harika bir soru bu.{/n}
